description: Try our easy to follow Gooey Peanut Butter & Chocolate Pudding recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Gooey Peanut Butter & Chocolate Pudding Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C. Grease an 18cm cake pan and line base and side with baking paper, ensuring paper extends 3cm above the sides.

Place butter and chocolate in a microwave-safe bowl and heat on high for 1 minute. Stir and repeat until melted and smooth. Whisk eggs, sugar and peanut butter together in a separate bowl. Add to chocolate mixture and stir to combine. Add flour and a pinch of salt and stir until smooth. Add 10 marshmallows and fold them in. Transfer to pan and top with remaining marshmallows.

Combine cocoa, extra caster sugar and 1/3 cup boiling water in a bowl. Pour over pudding batter. Bake for 20 minutes or until a crust forms on top of pudding. Reduce oven to 150°C and cook for a further 1 hour or until slightly firm on top and gooey in the centre. Stand for 10 minutes. To serve, top with ice-cream and peanuts, and dust with extra cocoa.
